title: Festive favourite makeup looks to don this Diwali
text:
View this post on Instagram A post shared by Sonam K Ahuja (@sonamkapoor) on Oct 16, 2019 at 9:13am PDT

There’s no better time or reason to dress your best than this time of the year. Festivities are in full swing and it’s all going to be about fun, food and fashion as the decade comes to a close, and glamorously so! As you get your wardrobe Diwali-ready, here are some celeb-inspired makeup ideas that are perfect for your ethnic swag.Think earthy tones, bold and brown smoky eye, crazy contouring and well-sculpted brows.Sonam Kapoor Ahuja
description: This Diwali, wear makeup like Bollywood diavs—Sonam Kapoor Ahuja, Janhvi Kapoor, Kriti Sanon, Deepika Padukone.
